mapper.insert: insert into t_system_config (f_id, f_create_time, f_update_time, f_version, f_type, f_key, f_name, f_value, f_comments, f_status) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update t_system_config set f_create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, f_update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, f_version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, f_type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_key = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_name = #{name,jdbcType=TINYINT}, f_value = #{value,jdbcType=TINYINT}, f_comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from t_system_config where f_status = 1 order by f_id
